parameter.name: local-Web.config Connection String
parameter.description: local Connection String used in web.config by the application to access the database.
parameter.defaultValue: Data Source=localhost\sqlexpress;Initial Catalog=Calorie5;Persist Security Info=True;User ID=sa;Password=secret#1

parameter.name: local_DatabasePublish-Web.config Connection String
parameter.description: local_DatabasePublish Connection String used in web.config by the application to access the database.
